```{r setup, echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)

mayoicon <- makeIcon(iconUrl = "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/7/76/Mayo-clinic-logo.png",
                     iconWidth = 96,
                     iconHeight = 128)

mymap <- leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>% addMarkers(lat = c(44.0222, 30.264330, 33.659370), 
                                                 lng = c(-92.4666, -81.437347, -111.956299), 
                                                 popup = c("Mayo Clinic: Rochester", "Mayo Clinic: Jacksonville", "Mayo Clinic: Pheonix"), 
                                                 icon=mayoicon)
mymap
```
